subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Alert,
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I have no idea how to test spirits. People think cuz I made the box I must
be somekind of guru or something.

 F-S

On Wed, Jun 9, 2010 at 11:13 PM, <SnowfireL@...> wrote:

>
>
> A while back, last summer, I received some really great files which I
> posted on this list, when wisely I was advised by Misty I think to take them
> off, because they gave the name, the full name where he lived, and what he
> did for a living, even down to the business name, and I never asked a thing,
> it was just spirit telling me things, and sure enough in CA, is  where I
> found out that all of the info.  had checked out, i am glad I listened to
> her, because someone could have got all the info. and approached his family
> or something.  I have info on people that have been murdered too, spirit
> gave names, places for where the body was found, and other cases as well.  I
> don't call that merely spirit entertaining themselves with what I want to
> hear.  If we 'test the spirits" and if we don't make a game out of this,
> they will take things seriously too.  Of course we talk through the mind
> over there because we no longer have vocal cords to use.  Some where in
> Bible it says something like, nothing is kept hidden, to each is own, I just
> take it more seriously then others, it's not a parlor game after all they
> are just people too. sf
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: JANDANACOSTA <jandan108@yahoo.com>
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>  Sent: Wed, Jun 9, 2010 9:30 pm
> Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Alert,
>
>
>    I totally agree, Tim. This is a complicated issue. Spirit seems to be
> able to know our thoughts prior to our speaking, as well so if a Spirit
> might want to trick or endear themselves to the communicator, then there is
> a possibility of misinformation or lying.
> If as researchers, we are only attempting to establish that Spirit
> Communication actually exsists, then we must be more generalized in the
> questions we ask. If one has a topic on their mind or a need to have
> specific information given to them, the research will automatically become
> questionable, IMO.
>
> --- On *Wed, 6/9/10, tim_woolworth <tim@...>* wrote:
>
>
> From: tim_woolworth <tim@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Alert,
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Wednesday, June 9, 2010, 1:41 PM
>
>
> I would be cautious accepting responses from a box as gospel. I have had
> contradictory responses about religion come through, but then again, I align
> myself much closer with atheism than christianity.
>
> Many times I feel that the boxes tell us what we want to hear. Why? I could
> not tell you. It could be spirits playing with our heads, or, it could be a
> piece of our unconscious coming through the radio. This does happen, I have
> recorded the voices of people in the same room with me coming through with
> the same speech patterns (although this happened twice with a Shack hack but
> I haven't had it happen with my Minibox yet).
>
> So in short, if you ascribe to a belief and keep asking pointed questions
> about that belief over and over, do not be surprised when you hear what you
> believe coming through the box.
>
> Tim
>
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
> >
> > gee, I'll be sure to make note of it, sf
> >
> >
> > In a message dated 6/9/2010 1:31:09 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,
> > shgiruss@... writes:
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > Snowfire, if i was dead (passed on) and was able to by happenstance come
> > across you and the evp device and you asked me the question, what makes
> you
> > think I know what I am talking about? Because I would tell you that their
>
> > is no antichrist, no devil, no anthropomorphic hebrew savage god who
> > commands his people to murder children and women in one town and in the
> next town
> > kill all but virgin girls (old testament).
> >
> > I would say that there is only consciousness, not confined to any man
> made
> > religion.
> >
> > with love,
> > Russ
> >
> > --- On Tue, 6/8/10, SnowfireL@..., 6/8/10, S<SnowfireL@...> wrote:
> >
> >
> > From: SnowfireL@...<SnowfireL@...>

> RTSC@yahoogroups.<WBR>com,

> >

> >
> > this one is very scary, I have not cleaned it up, I was asking about the
> > antichrist, and if he was released yet, and they are saying, "yes, he has
>
> > been released, yes, he has, and that Christ is coming." Please, don't get
>
> > left here, just believe in what JC did, and don't be left behind, "the
> > teleport is going to be instantaneous, " we won't feel a thing, one
> minute you
> > will be sitting at a desk, next minute we will find our self in some
> grassy
> > field is what I was told. I have more, I haven't cleaned them up yet, but
>
> > you can see how plain and clear they are from that newer RS that I messed
>
> > up the other day. They are saying scary things on it, they said, he is
> not
> > the devil, that the antichrist is a "spirit energy" "worse then the
> devil,"
> > and will "infect" posess some person after Obama.
> >
>

I ha e no idea how o es spi i s. People hink cuz I made he box I mus be somekind o gu u o some hing.
